scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/basic run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run build && npm --prefix packages/knowledge run build && npm --prefix packages/server run build && npm run build:web
scripts.build:dev: npm --prefix packages/basic run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run build && npm --prefix packages/knowledge run build && npm --prefix packages/server run build && npm run build:web:dev
scripts.build:web: WEB_PKG=${WEB_PACKAGE:-web}; if [ -d "packages/$WEB_PKG" ]; then npm --prefix packages/$WEB_PKG run build; else echo "Error: Web package 'packages/$WEB_PKG' not found. Set WEB_PACKAGE environment variable or create packages/web." && exit 1; fi
scripts.build:web:dev: WEB_PKG=${WEB_PACKAGE:-web}; if [ -d "packages/$WEB_PKG" ]; then npm --prefix packages/$WEB_PKG run build:dev; else echo "Error: Web package 'packages/$WEB_PKG' not found. Set WEB_PACKAGE environment variable or create packages/web." && exit 1; fi
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/dist-* packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo node_modules/.cache
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run seed:root && npm --prefix packages/server run dev
scripts.dev:web: WEB_PKG=${WEB_PACKAGE:-web}; if [ -d "packages/$WEB_PKG" ]; then npm --prefix packages/$WEB_PKG run dev; else echo "Error: Web package 'packages/$WEB_PKG' not found. Set WEB_PACKAGE environment variable or create packages/web." && exit 1; fi
scripts.dev:both: npm run build && (npm --prefix packages/server run dev & npm run dev:web)
scripts.test: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run test && npm --prefix packages/server run test:security:basic
scripts.test:server: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/server run test:all
scripts.docker:up: docker compose build && docker compose up -d
